s: In their heyday, PICKWICK albums had ten tracks (or less) and were mainly licensed reissues of major brand material. Mono recordings were often rechanneled into fake stereo. . The 1981 Neil Diamond compilation, SOLITARY MAN (SHM-3093) is on the PICKWICK/UK label.
